key.name: gitlab-url
key.description: The URL of your GitLab server (e.g., https://gitlab.com)

key.name: gitlab-token
key.description: Personal access token for GitLab API authentication

key.name: report-tags-filter
key.description: Comma-separated list of tags or regex patterns to filter in reports (e.g., "Maintenance corrective,^Maintenance.*$"). Leave empty to show all tags.

key.name: timer-state
key.description: JSON string containing the current timer state (for persistence across lock screen)
